Trianglify is a Javascript library for creating unique, aesthetically pleasing triangle patterns.

Try It Out

You can generate Trianglify patterns without writing a single line of code at trianglify.io

Getting Started

Developer documentation and a getting started guide is available on GitHub

Examples

There are a variety of examples you can download and run here

About

My name is Quinn Rohlf, and I'm a roaming engineer/designer based in the Pacific Northwest. Trianglify is a tool I wrote to generate low-poly style patterns using a Delaunay triangulation combined with some nice colors. It was originally released in April of 2014. Trianglify v4.0.0, released May 2020, was a ground-up modernized rewrite of the original source.

Trianglify was inspired by @jasonlong's GeoPattern library for Ruby.
